member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.DragAndDrop.DragItem`1.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.DragAndDrop.DragItem`1.AllOtherAttributes
member.summary: Blazor capture for any unmatched HTML attributes.
